@graph.name: LeafTok - AI-Powered Reading App | Transform Books into Smart Cards
@graph.description: Revolutionary AI-powered reading app that transforms any book into bite-sized, swipeable cards. Perfect for students, professionals, and AI enthusiasts. Enhanced learning with spaced repetition and smart algorithms. Available worldwide on iOS and Android.

mainEntity.name: What is LeafTok and how does it use AI?

acceptedAnswer.text: LeafTok is a 5-star rated AI-powered reading app that uses artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms to transform any book into intelligent, bite-sized cards. With over 50 books already transformed by our growing community of 30+ users, the AI analyzes content, extracts key concepts, and creates optimized learning cards with personalized spaced repetition for enhanced memory retention.

mainEntity.name: What file formats does LeafTok support?

acceptedAnswer.text: LeafTok supports multiple digital book formats including PDF, EPUB, and TXT files. Our AI algorithms can process and transform any of these formats into interactive learning cards.

mainEntity.name: How does the spaced repetition system work?

acceptedAnswer.text: LeafTok uses advanced machine learning algorithms to implement spaced repetition. The system tracks your learning progress, calculates optimal review intervals based on your individual forgetting curve, and prioritizes content based on importance and retention probability.

Yes, LeafTok is available worldwide on both iOS and Android platforms. The app supports multiple languages including English and Portuguese, with plans to expand to more languages based on user demand.

LeafTok offers a free version with core AI-powered features. Our 5-star rating from 30+ users demonstrates the quality of our free offering. Additional premium features may be available through subscription plans to support continued development and AI improvements.
